workbench.warning: The setting in PF2e Workbench to use Variant Hero Point house rules is enabled and will cause the stats to be incorrect.
workbench.fixIntro: To fix this, you can either:
workbench.step1: Change the setting manually under PF2e Workbench and set "Variant Hero Point house rules" to Normal.
